titleStmt.title: Propositions made by the Lords and Commons in Parliament for the speedie and effectuall reducing of the kingdom of Ireland and the votes thereupon, by both houses presented unto the Kings Majestie : with His Majesties gracious answer and royall assent thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: Propositions made by the Lords and Commons in Parliament for the speedie and effectuall reducing of the kingdom of Ireland and the votes thereupon, by both houses presented unto the Kings Majestie : with His Majesties gracious answer and royall assent thereunto.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 210:19 as Wing E2206 (number cancelled in Wing Cd-ROM, 1996) and at reel 250:E.136, no. 9 identified as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) P3795.
Title varies: at reel 250:E.136, no. 9, reads, "Propositions made to the Lords and Commons in Parliament for the speedie and effectuall reducing of the kingdom of Ireland."
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
